Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the ritual lair

A mostly eery room, this dark space appears to be a designated workshop of sorts. Three granite tables have been aligned with the western wall, while a worn oak table holding various bubbling mixtures faces them. Each and every surface is littered with remnants of chemicals and herbs, as if not a single inch of the place was left to waste. The northeastern area proves to be a stand-out feature with lavish decorations lending an almost fashionable air to the otherwise bleak surroundings.
The ritual lair.

A mostly eery room, this dark space appears to be a designated workshop of sorts. Three granite tables have been aligned with the western wall, while a worn oak table holding various bubbling mixtures faces them. Each and every surface is littered with remnants of chemicals and herbs, as if not a single inch of the place was left to waste. The northeastern area proves to be a stand-out feature with lavish decorations lending an almost fashionable air to the otherwise bleak surroundings.
http://img391.imageshack.us/img391/2908/lairs.jpg
http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc100/sbguinness/guardroom.jpg
a massive oak door

A massive oak door covered in a series of iron bolts and plates as a means of fortification. The wood of the door itself is thick and heavy, making the door harder to open for those of lesser strength. Regardless of the defenses, the door suffers from a number of cleaves and scratches giving it a worn and gnarled appearance.
A massive oak door covered in a series of iron bolts and plates as a means of fortification.
the iron bolts of a massive oak door
A series of iron bolts scatter the massive oak door intermittently; these aid in strengthening the thick oak wood beneath.
the square-shaped red and gold carpet
A square-shaped red and gold pile carpet has been laid in the northeastern corner of the room. A luxurious black leather chair rests upon it to provide for a comfortable seating arrangement.
A square-shaped red and gold pile carpet has been laid in the northeastern corner of the room. A luxurious chair rests upon it to provide for a comfortable seating arrangement.
the blackened ceiling
The ceiling of this room is represented by the cave-like dome above. Here and there appears to be a variety of blackened marks as if from chemical explosions.
The ceiling of this room is represented by the cave-like dome above. Here and there appears to be a variety of blackened marks as if from chemical explosions.
The ceiling of this room is represented by the cave-like dome above. Here and there appears to be a variety of blackened marks as if from chemical explosions.

The ceiling of this room is represented by the cave-like dome above. Here and there appears to be a variety of blackened marks as if from chemical explosions.
luxurious black leather chair

A heavily-padded black leather chair rests atop the square-shaped red and gold pile carpet in the northeastern corner of the room. Folds of luxurious leather cascade downward to oversized padded arms and sturdy, black oak clawed feet providing for a comfortable seating arrangement. This piece of furniture is amazingly flawless considering the environment, with no apparent tearing or breaking in its structure.

A heavily-padded black leather chair rests atop the square-shaped red and gold pile carpet in the northeastern corner of the room. Folds of luxurious leather cascade downward to oversized padded arms and sturdy, black oak clawed feet providing for a comfortable seating arrangement. This piece of furniture is amazingly flawless considering the environment, with no apparent tearing or breaking in its structure.
the decorated northeastern corner

The northeast corner of the room. Within this corner is a large protrusion of rock, as if someone forgot to chisel and tile it to match the wall. Upon the rock are patches of uncut crystals. This portion of the room has been fashionably decorated with a square-shaped red and gold pile carpet, a luxurious black leather chair, a lantern, and a hanging silk curtain.

the gently curving northwest corner

The northwest corner of the room. The corners of the room are barely distinguishable from the walls, except for the northeast corner which appears to have been forgotten about in the process of hollowing out this chamber.

the mismatched corners
The corners of the room. All the corners, excluding the northeast corner, appear to blend in with the walls.

the gold and black silk hanging curtain
A gold and black silk hanging curtain has been situated in the northeastern corner of the room to provide for privacy.
A gold and black silk hanging curtain has been situated in the northeastern corner of the room to provide for privacy.
the cobblestone floor

The floor is comprised of many different sizes and shapes of stone slotted together sporadically. Dark spots haphazardly decorate the floor, melting the stones into an obscure darkness. The flickering light of the candles illuminate some parallel furrows clawed into the solid material along with the occasional piece of thoughtlessly discarded rotted flesh. Marks of liquid spilled over the stones add to the chaotic gloom of the floor. There is a break in the cobblestones at the northeastern corner of the room where a fashionable square-shaped red and gold carpet has been laid.
The floor is comprised of many different sizes and shapes of stone slotted together sporadically.
the blackened marks on the ceiling
The blackened marks on the ceiling, formed as if from chemical explosions.
the iron plates of a massive oak door
The iron plates of the massive oak door offer fortification to the gnarled wood underneath. The plates have been crafted to circle the edges of the door itself to aid in strengthening it.
the tiled eastern wall
The eastern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
The eastern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
the tiled northern wall
The northern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
The northern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
the tiled southern wall

The southern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment. Set in this wall is a massive oak door, fortified with iron bolts and plates. Flanking the door on either side is a pair of matching iron sconces which illuminate the door and wall, casting eerie shadows about the place.

The southern wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment. Set in this wall is a massive oak door, fortified with iron bolts and plates. Flanking the door on either side is a pair of matching iron sconces which illuminate the door and wall, casting eerie shadows about the place.
the tiled western wall

The western wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment. Three granite preparation tables are aligned here with a work oak alchemist's table resting just to their front.
The western wall of the room is tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
the partway-tiled walls
The walls surrounding the room; they are tiled up to hip height as a form of support. The remainder of the wall inclines and joins with the ceiling to create a natural, cave-like environment.
